price: 33. Waxaa idiinku sugan (xoolaha loo bixiyey sadaqada - hadyiga) manaafacaad tan iyo muddo magacaaban11ah, markaas waxaa loo keenaa gowrac Baytka da’da weyn12.
arabic: لَكُمۡ فِيهَا مَنَٰفِعُ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٖ مُّسَمّٗى ثُمَّ مَحِلُّهَآ إِلَى ٱلۡبَيۡتِ ٱلۡعَتِيقِ
footnotes:
11. Waxaa loola jeedaa hadyiga, waa lagu intifaaci karaa ka hor inta aan la gowricin sida in la listo caanahooda, ama la fuulo, iwm ilaa maalinta gowraca. 
12. Xuduudda Xaramka, waxaana soo galaya sidoo kale Mina.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: lakum fīhā manāfiʿu ilā ajalin musamman thumma maḥilluhā ilā al-bayti al-ʿatīqi
